strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
We have good news and bad news.. Good news: it's the weekend and there is a lot happening! Bad news: a lot of events have been cancelled. However, as of now here is what we know is occurring:

  • Glowing fun: Take part tonight in transforming the art trail into a glow trail at CBMAA.
  • Craving tunes: Looking for the right live music this weekend, find all the shows in the area here.
  • BFF: Bentonville Film Festival continues through this weekend with multiple showings in person and virtual.
  • Grape Festival: Tontitown's annual Grape Festival is happening today and tomorrow.
  • Paint off: Saturday, there is some messy family-friendly fun with a paint party happening at CBMAA.
  • Celebrate the small town: Elkfest 2021 is happening this weekend out in Elkins.
  • Lady A: Lady A is performing on Saturday at the Walmart AMP in Rogers.
  • NWA Comic Con: Happening this Saturday and Sunday in Rogers.
  • WOZ: Women of OZ have their monthly flagship ride in Bentonville on Saturday.

Have a great weekend and see you Monday!
